WorkItem.Description:
When I try to start the download of the ClickOne Installer, it tells me "Download will start in 3... 2... 1 seconds", but then nothing happens... No message, no download, nothing.
Â 
Any alternative download link?

Comments.Message:
Update: I finally managed to install it.

There seems to be a problem with the https download.
After I changed the URL to http instead of https, it worked without problems.

I am having the same problem, but with HTTP as well. The error I get is:

Webpage error details

User Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; InfoPath.3; Zune 4.7)
Timestamp: Sat, 26 May 2012 14:17:20 UTC


Message: Expected identifier
Line: 2
Char: 9
Code: 0
URI: http://1code.codeplex.com/downloads/get/clickOnce/SampleBrowser.application

Any ideas?

Hello

Thanks for reporting this issue. It's a known issue of CodePlex that impacts users who use IE to download the clickonce app. The CodePlex team is trying to fix the problem this week. The current workaround is to use Chrome or FireFox to install the Sample Browser. Here is a blog article with more details. 
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/codefx/archive/2012/05/27/issue-report-sample-browser-clickonce-installation-is-not-started-in-ie.aspx

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Program Manager
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework
